title: Raygun's nightmare
creator_credit: Peter Wallach, David Jablin, Atlantic Television and Imagination Productions
brief_description: An animated satire combining a mixture of live, puppets and computer animation, on American politics in which President Raygun has a terrible nightmare about the invasion of America by a huge Japanese electronic monster. Suitable for upper secondary level.
creator_credit_for_label: Peter Wallach, David Jablin, Atlantic Television and Imagination Productions
